languages.text: "Когда за погибшего некому говорить на суде, его представитель вправе позвать члена гильдии Усыпальников. Их служба — знать и помнить каждого, чтобы уметь защитить интересы усопшего и выступить на суде от его лица. Они изучают всю жизнь умершего, чтобы составить наиболее точное представление о его личности, делах и желаниях. Эта гильдия была учреждена вашим далеким предком и существует лишь на нашем славном флагмане".

traits.locale_text: "Когда за погибшего некому говорить на суде, его представитель вправе позвать члена гильдии Усыпальников. Их служба — помнить каждого, чтобы уметь защитить интересы усопшего. Насколько мне известно, эта гильдия — единственная в своем роде и существует только на нашем корабле. Методы Усыпальников необычны, но надежны, и они постоянно доказывают свою пользу на подобных разбирательствах".

languages.text: "When there is no one to speak for a deceased person in court, their representative is entitled to seek assistance from a member of the Requiescators' Guild. Their duty is to know and remember each and every person on this ship so that they can defend the interests of the deceased and represent them in court. They study the victim's entire life history to gain the most detailed impression of their personality, deeds, and aspirations. The guild was founded by one of your distant ancestors and, to my knowledge, the Requiescators only exist on our glorious flagship."
languages.original_text: "Когда за погибшего некому говорить на суде, его представитель вправе позвать члена гильдии Усыпальников. Их служба — знать и помнить каждого, чтобы уметь защитить интересы усопшего и выступить на суде от его лица. Они изучают всю жизнь умершего, чтобы составить наиболее точное представление о его личности, делах и желаниях. Эта гильдия была учреждена вашим далеким предком и существует лишь на нашем славном флагмане".

traits.locale_text: "When there is no one to speak for a deceased person in court, their representative is entitled to seek assistance from a member of the Requiescators' Guild. Their duty is to know and remember each and every person on this ship so that they can defend the interests of the deceased and represent them in court. They study the victim's entire life's history to gain the most detailed impression of their personality, deeds, and aspirations. The guild was founded by one of your distant ancestors and, to my knowledge, the Requiescators only exist on our glorious flagship."

"When there's no one to speak for a deceased person in court, their representative is entitled to seek the help of a member of the Requiescators' Guild. Their duty is to remember everyone so that they're able to defend the interests of the deceased. And they are quite adept at remembering. From now on and for the duration of the trial, you can address him the same way you'd have addressed Lettard Forius himself."

"When there is no one to speak for a deceased person in court, their representative is entitled to seek assistance from a member of the Requiescators' Guild. Their duty is to know and remember each and every person on this ship so that they can defend the interests of the deceased and represent them in court. They study the victim's entire life history to gain the most detailed impression of their personality, deeds, and aspirations. The guild was founded by one of your distant ancestors and, to my knowledge, the Requiescators only exist on our glorious flagship."

From now on and for the duration of the trial, you can address him just as you would have addressed Lettard Forius himself."

languages.text: « Lorsqu'il n'y a personne pour parler au nom d'un défunt au tribunal, son représentant a le droit de demander l'aide d'un membre de la guilde des requiescators. Ils ont pour devoir de connaître et de mémoriser l'identité de tous, afin de pouvoir les défendre en cas de décès et plaider leur cause devant la cour. Ils étudient le parcours de vie de la victime dans son intégralité de manière à se faire une idée précise de sa personnalité, de ses agissements et de ses aspirations. La guilde a été fondée par l'un de vos lointains ancêtres et, pour autant que je sache, les resquiescators n'existent qu'à bord de votre glorieux vaisseau amiral. »
languages.original_text: "When there is no one to speak for a deceased person in court, their representative is entitled to seek assistance from a member of the Requiescators' Guild. Their duty is to know and remember each and every person on this ship so that they can defend the interests of the deceased and represent them in court. They study the victim's entire life history to gain the most detailed impression of their personality, deeds, and aspirations. The guild was founded by one of your distant ancestors and, to my knowledge, the Requiescators only exist on our glorious flagship."

traits.locale_text: « Lorsqu'il n'y a personne pour parler au nom d'un défunt au tribunal, son représentant a le droit de demander l'aide d'un membre de la guilde des requiescators. Ils ont pour devoir de connaître et de mémoriser l'identité de tous, afin de pouvoir les défendre en cas de décès et plaider leur cause devant la cour. Ils étudient le parcours de vie de la victime dans son intégralité de manière à se faire une idée précise de sa personnalité, de ses agissements et de ses aspirations. La guilde a été fondée par l'un de vos lointains ancêtres et, pour autant que je sache, les resquiescators n'existent qu'à bord de votre glorieux vaisseau amiral. »

languages.text: «Cuando no hay nadie que pueda hablar por un muerto en el tribunal, su representante tiene derecho a solicitar la ayuda de un miembro del gremio de requiescators. Su deber es recordar la identidad de cada persona de esta nave para que puedan defender los intereses de los muertos y representarlos en el tribunal. Comprueban toda la vida de la víctima para conocer cada rasgo de su personalidad, obras y aspiraciones. Fue uno de sus antepasados quien fundó el gremio y, hasta donde yo sé, los requiescators solo existen en nuestra nave insignia».
languages.original_text: "When there is no one to speak for a deceased person in court, their representative is entitled to seek assistance from a member of the Requiescators' Guild. Their duty is to know and remember each and every person on this ship so that they can defend the interests of the deceased and represent them in court. They study the victim's entire life history to gain the most detailed impression of their personality, deeds, and aspirations. The guild was founded by one of your distant ancestors and, to my knowledge, the Requiescators only exist on our glorious flagship."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando no hay nadie que pueda hablar por un muerto en el tribunal, su representante tiene derecho a solicitar la ayuda de un miembro del gremio de requiescators. Su deber es recordar la identidad de cada persona de esta nave para que puedan defender los intereses de los muertos y representarlos en el tribunal. Comprueban toda la vida de la víctima para conocer cada rasgo de su personalidad, obras y aspiraciones. Fue uno de sus antepasados quien fundó el gremio y, hasta donde yo sé, los requiescators solo existen en nuestra nave insignia».

languages.text: 「法廷において故人の代弁者がいない場合、その代理人は鎮魂師のギルドメンバーに援助を求める権利があります。彼らの義務は、亡くなった人の利益を擁護し、法廷で彼らの代理を務めることができるように、この船の一人ひとりを知り、記憶することです。彼らは被害者の全生活史を調査し、その性格、行い、願望について最も詳細な印象を得ます。このギルドはあなたの遠い祖先の一人が創設したもので、私の知る限り、鎮魂師は私たちの栄光ある旗艦にしか存在しません」
languages.original_text: "When there is no one to speak for a deceased person in court, their representative is entitled to seek assistance from a member of the Requiescators' Guild. Their duty is to know and remember each and every person on this ship so that they can defend the interests of the deceased and represent them in court. They study the victim's entire life history to gain the most detailed impression of their personality, deeds, and aspirations. The guild was founded by one of your distant ancestors and, to my knowledge, the Requiescators only exist on our glorious flagship."

traits.locale_text: 「法廷において故人の代弁者がいない場合、その代理人は鎮魂師のギルドメンバーに援助を求める権利があります。彼らの義務は、亡くなった人の利益を擁護し、法廷で彼らの代理を務めることができるように、この船の一人ひとりを知り、記憶することです。彼らは被害者の全生活史を調査し、その性格、行い、願望について最も詳細な印象を得ます。このギルドはあなたの遠い祖先の一人が創設したもので、私の知る限り、鎮魂師は私たちの栄光ある旗艦にしか存在しません」

languages.text: “当法庭上没人为死者辩护时，死者的代理人有权向安魂师行会寻求帮助。安魂师的职责是了解船上所有船员，牢牢记住他们的一切细节，以便捍卫死者的权益，在法庭上代表他们发言。他们会研究死者的全部细节，从而巨细靡遗地了解死者的性格、思想、行为方式等等。安魂工会是由您的某位先祖建立的，据我所知，只有我们光荣的旗舰上才存在安魂师这样的角色。”
languages.original_text: "When there is no one to speak for a deceased person in court, their representative is entitled to seek assistance from a member of the Requiescators' Guild. Their duty is to know and remember each and every person on this ship so that they can defend the interests of the deceased and represent them in court. They study the victim's entire life history to gain the most detailed impression of their personality, deeds, and aspirations. The guild was founded by one of your distant ancestors and, to my knowledge, the Requiescators only exist on our glorious flagship."

traits.locale_text: “当法庭上没人为死者辩护时，死者的代理人有权向安魂师行会寻求帮助。安魂师的职责是了解船上所有船员，牢牢记住他们的一切细节，以便捍卫死者的权益，在法庭上代表他们发言。他们会研究死者的全部细节，从而巨细靡遗地了解死者的性格、思想、行为方式等等。安魂工会是由您的某位先祖建立的，据我所知，只有我们光荣的旗舰上才存在安魂师这样的角色。”

languages.text: Wenn niemand vor Gericht für eine verstorbene Person sprechen kann, hat ihr Vertreter das Recht, ein Mitglied der Requiescatoren-Gilde um Unterstützung zu bitten. Ihre Pflicht ist es, sich an jede einzelne Person auf diesem Schiff zu erinnern, damit sie die Interessen der Verstorbenen verteidigen und sie vor Gericht vertreten kann. Sie studieren die gesamte Lebensgeschichte des Opfers, um ein detailliertes Bild seiner Persönlichkeit, Taten und Träume zu erhalten. Die Gilde wurde von einem Eurer Vorfahren gegründet und meines Wissens gibt es Requiescatoren nur auf unserem ruhmreichen Flaggschiff.
languages.original_text: "When there is no one to speak for a deceased person in court, their representative is entitled to seek assistance from a member of the Requiescators' Guild. Their duty is to know and remember each and every person on this ship so that they can defend the interests of the deceased and represent them in court. They study the victim's entire life history to gain the most detailed impression of their personality, deeds, and aspirations. The guild was founded by one of your distant ancestors and, to my knowledge, the Requiescators only exist on our glorious flagship."

traits.locale_text: Wenn niemand vor Gericht für eine verstorbene Person sprechen kann, hat ihr Vertreter das Recht, ein Mitglied der Requiescatoren-Gilde um Unterstützung zu bitten. Ihre Pflicht ist es, sich an jede einzelne Person auf diesem Schiff zu erinnern, damit sie die Interessen der Verstorbenen verteidigen und sie vor Gericht vertreten kann. Sie studieren die gesamte Lebensgeschichte des Opfers, um ein detailliertes Bild seiner Persönlichkeit, Taten und Träume zu erhalten. Die Gilde wurde von einem Eurer Vorfahren gegründet und meines Wissens gibt es Requiescatoren nur auf unserem ruhmreichen Flaggschiff.

languages.text: "Mahkemede vefat eden şahıs adına konuşacak kimse olmadığında temsilcisi, Ağıtgetirenler Loncası'nın bir mensubundan yardım isteme hakkına sahiptir. Ağıtgetirenlerin vazifesi, bu gemideki her bir insanı tanıyıp hatırlamaktır. Bu sayede vefat eden şahsın çıkarlarını gözetip onu mahkemede temsil edebilirler. Kurbanın tüm hayat hikâyesini inceleyerek kişilikleri, eylemleri ve ilgileri hakkında en ayrıntılı izlenime ulaşırlar. Lonca, uzaktan akraba olduğunuz bir atanız tarafından kuruldu. Ağıtgetirenler, bildiğim kadarıyla yalnızca şanlı sancak gemimizde mevcuttur."
languages.original_text: "When there is no one to speak for a deceased person in court, their representative is entitled to seek assistance from a member of the Requiescators' Guild. Their duty is to know and remember each and every person on this ship so that they can defend the interests of the deceased and represent them in court. They study the victim's entire life history to gain the most detailed impression of their personality, deeds, and aspirations. The guild was founded by one of your distant ancestors and, to my knowledge, the Requiescators only exist on our glorious flagship."
